mapper.select: SELECT msg.id AS id, msg.account_id AS accountId, msg.respond_to_messages_id AS messageId, msg.respond_to_messages_id_id AS messagePid, msg.message, msg.time, ac.user_name AS hfname FROM tb_artilce_respond_to_messages AS msg, tb_account AS ac WHERE msg.article_id IS NULL AND msg.respond_to_messages_id_id IS NULL AND msg.account_id = ac.id ORDER BY msg.time ASC

SELECT msg.id AS id, msg.account_id AS accountId, msg.respond_to_messages_id AS messageId, msg.respond_to_messages_id_id AS messagePid, msg.message, msg.time, ac.user_name AS hfname FROM tb_artilce_respond_to_messages AS msg, tb_account AS ac WHERE msg.article_id IS NULL AND msg.respond_to_messages_id_id = #{replymsgid} AND msg.account_id = ac.id ORDER BY msg.time ASC
